verbs.description: [ARG0: he] [V: got] [ARG1: 17 years] [ARG3: for selling drugs near school] [ARGM-TMP: now] 12 nashville officials are fighting on his behalf because the crime took place within 1 000 feet of a school state law mandated a longer sentence one that the council members noted was more severe than the sentence he would have received for committing a violent crime such as rape or second - degree murder daniel horwitz nashville calvin eugene bryant metro council
